name: Down (RRooly)
description:
Context and presentation :

You woke up in a dark cellar and lost your abilities. Drive into the dungeon in search of your lost abilities and defeat the evil that lives there.

Player Inputs  :

  • Movement : WASD
  • Attack : Left-click
  • Open skilltree : O
  • Dash : Space
